body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Save a .dec anywhere other than the default decks folder
2. Select load deck
3. Browse to anywhere other than deck folder; immediate crash What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Should load the valid .dec; instead crashes entire Magarena What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Latest (1.28) If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [kfiresm...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102768122264957648302/)
title: Repeatable crash by loading deck from location other than default

comments.body:
Having looked at the crash.log I think this is related to issue 416 . I tried loading and saving a dec from another drive without any problems using version 1.44.

**Status:** Duplicate  
  **Mergedinto:** 416
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

content:
_From [kfiresm...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102768122264957648302/) on August 13, 2012 01:10:47_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Save a .dec anywhere other than the default decks folder
2. Select load deck
3. Browse to anywhere other than deck folder; immediate crash What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Should load the valid .dec; instead crashes entire Magarena What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Latest (1.28) If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.

**Attachment:** [game.log crash.log](http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=274)

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=274_
